summary: Two silent movie actors escape from their film. Forced to find a way to survive in the real world, they will only cause troubles to the people they will meet along the way.
cast: Renato Pozzetto|Paolo Villaggio|Enzo Cannavale|Fabio Traversa|Alessandra Casella|Gian|Tiziana Pini|Renato D'Amore|Giampaolo Saccarola|Sal Borgese|Pierfrancesco Villaggio|Benedetta Altissimi|Ennio Antonelli|Andrea Belfiore|Alberto Capone|Maurizio Carmine Giorgetta|Marcello Magnelli|Luigi Nicolosi|Daniela Rindi|Saverio Tallarida|Giuseppe Vasta|Piero Vivaldi|Pasquale Africano|Franca Scagnetti
title: Le comiche
